mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, empNo, subject, content, notice, hitCount, reg_date) VALUES(#{num}, #{empNo}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{notice}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT n.num, notice, n.empNo, name, subject, hitCount, TO_CHAR(n.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, d.depName FROM notice n JOIN employee e ON n.empNo = e.empNo JOIN person_record pr ON e.empNo = pr.empNo JOIN department d ON d.depNo = pr.depNo WHERE notice = 1 AND state = 1 ORDER BY num DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN employee e ON n.empNo = e.empNo

SELECT n.num, notice, n.empNo, name, subject, hitCount, n.reg_date, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount, d.depName FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY num ) f ON n.num=f.num JOIN employee e ON n.empNo = e.empNo JOIN person_record pr ON e.empNo = pr.empNo JOIN department d ON d.depNo = pr.depNo
AND state = 1
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT n.num, n.empNo, e.name, subject, content, n.reg_date, hitCount, notice, d.depNo, d.depName FROM notice n JOIN employee e ON n.empNo = e.empNo JOIN person_record pr ON e.empNo = pr.empNo JOIN department d ON d.depNo = pr.depNo WHERE n.num = #{num} AND state = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET hitCount = hitCount + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT num, subject FROM notice n JOIN employee e ON n.empNo = e.empNo
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM notice n JOIN employee e ON n.empNo = e.empNo
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeFile(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES(noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
